mapper.select: select sum(ajsl) as ajsl from rec_qlczfba where lasj=#{lasj} and sljsdw is null
select ajlbmc,ajsl from rec_qlczfba where lasj=#{lasj} and sljsdw is null

select xzqh.xzqhmc as sljsdw ,sum(qlczfba.ajsl) as ajsl from rec_qlczfba qlczfba LEFT JOIN DICT_XZQHB xzqh ON SUBSTR(xzqh.xzqhdm,1, 4)=qlczfba.sljsdw where lasj=#{lasj} and sljsdw is not null group by substr(sljsdw,0,4),xzqh.xzqhmc
select hb as ajsl from rec_qlczfba where sljsdw='1400' and ajlbmc='环比' and lasj=#{tjTime}
select qlczfba.sljsdw ,sum(qlczfba.ajsl) as ajsl from rec_qlczfba qlczfba where lasj=#{lasj} and sljsdw is not null and qlczfba.sljsdw=substr(#{xzqhdm},1,4) group by substr(sljsdw,0,4),xzqh.xzqhmc
